title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the scope, requirements, and constraints of the PeerLearningExchange system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the PeerLearningExchange system, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user profiles, learning sessions, and other relevant data.

title: User Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms, including role-based access control.

title: Learning Session Management
description: Develop features for creating, scheduling, and managing peer-to-peer learning sessions.

title: User Profile and Skill Management
description: Implement functionality for users to create and update their profiles, including skills and areas of expertise.

title: Notification and Communication System
description: Develop a system for sending notifications and facilitating communication between users and session organizers.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the PeerLearningExchange system, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, to ensure the system's quality and reliability.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and implement DevOps practices for continuous integration, delivery, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API references, and troubleshooting resources.
